The CSA role was unique, and I won't refill the role after Ray Ozzie 's departure, Steve Ballmer wrote in an Oct. 18 e-mail to the company. 's an innovator and entrepreneur to the core, and this role suits him perfectly," Eric Schmidt said. "As Google has grown, managing the business has become more complicated," Eric Schmidt wrote. So Larry, Sergey Brin and I have been talking for a long time how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making-- and over the holidays we decided now was the right moment to make some changes to the way we are structured. The news of the shake-up came just before Google announced earnings for its most recent quarter.
